description: Try our easy to follow Pumpkin Hummus recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hummus,Pescatarian,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Pumpkin,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free
name: Pumpkin Hummus Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Peel 500g pumpkin and cut into 2cm pieces. Place into a baking paper-lined roasting pan. Add 1 tbs oil and 1 tsp cumin and toss well to coat. Add 2 unpeeled garlic cloves and roast for 25 minutes or until pumpkin is tender and golden. Cool slightly.

Transfer pumpkin to a food processor. Squeeze soft flesh from garlic and add to pumpkin with 1 drained 420g can no added salt chickpeas, 2 tbs lemon juice and 1 tbs tahini. Process until finely chopped. Add 1-2 tbs water and process until smooth, adding extra water if necessary. Spoon into sealable containers. Seal and refrigerate until ready to pack in an esky.
